constraints: Use English for all user-facing text in the application UI.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose them from outside those directories if needed.
Do not add third-party authentication providers; if authentication is ever needed, only Internet Identity is supported (not required for this website).
nonGoals: No online payment processing or checkout flow.
No admin dashboard or CMS for editing menu/gallery content.
No backend data storage is required for this static informational website (unless explicitly requested later).
